FuncDef:
The responder command creates a TWAMP Light Responder and displays the TWAMP Light Responder view. If the Responder specified in the sender command has been created, the command displays the Responder view.
The undo responder command deletes the TWAMP Light Responder.
By default, no TWAMP Light Responder is created.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To start TWAMP Light statistics collection, run the responder command to create a TWAMP Light Responder and display the TWAMP Light Responder view.
Precautions
The responder does not respond when the TWAMP Light Responder is deleted, and the TWAMP Light statistics show 100% packet loss, which is incorrect.
